name: Pipe Cutter
description:
Simulation of flowing water in a pipe and a cutter to cut through it. Using Nvidia FleX for water's physics and shaders.

Use keys shown in the game (A D Q E Up Down Left Right) to control the cutter. Try cutting the pipe in different shapes and see what happens to the water! If you want to start over, press G and to quit, Esc. 

Thanks for checking out my project, please leave comments and feel free to ask any questions about how things work.
